body_html:
I only really read enough to give some generalized c++ comments.

@ezyang Thanks so much for the review! You are totally right about the funky stuff I did for copying mt19937. I will go through your comments and address them. Also I am not sure why philox_offset_per_thread is atomic (really just followed what was present in the THCGeneratorState struct) but let me find out if we really need it to be atomic.

body:
> I only really read enough to give some generalized c++ comments.

@ezyang Thanks so much for the review! You are totally right about the funky stuff I did for copying mt19937. I will go through your comments and address them. Also I am not sure why philox_offset_per_thread is atomic (really just followed what was present in the THCGeneratorState struct) but let me find out if we really need it to be atomic.
